thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: David Marsiglia
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 David Marsiglia

author: David Marsiglia
title: David Marsiglia
text: Banggood selection and customer service are OUTSTANDING! Shipping was slow, but coming from China to US, I can't expect too much, it just takes long. When I had a problem with the time it took, their customer service was very prompt and extremely helpful. I will DEFINITELY order again! Two thumbs up!!
